CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.10.2.1a, parentbirthdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.10.2.1b, parentbirthdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.10.2.1 Date of Birth of Parent Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date of birth should be used if the precise birthday is known; otherwise the age should be used.
CustomField.label: Parent Birthdate
